definitions.definition: To adapt to something by more closely matching it, especially something normative .

subdefinitions.definition: To change to more closely match typical characteristics or behavior.
subdefinitions.label_groups: transitive , intransitive , often followed by to

definitions.definition: To be as required or recommended by a specification , regulation , or policy .

main_definition: ( transitive , intransitive ) To adapt to something by more closely matching it, especially something normative .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , of things or procedures ) To be as required or recommended by a specification , regulation , or policy .
